title: Junior Software Developer
subtitle: Software Engineering & Data Analysis | Problem Solving
bio: Computer science graduate with strong foundations in software development, data analysis, and machine learning. Experience building end-to-end solutions in C++ and Python, from data processing pipelines to production-ready applications. Proven ability to analyze complex problems, design efficient algorithms, and deliver working software. Seeking opportunities to contribute technical skills while continuing to grow in machine learning, backend development, or data engineering roles.
